scripts.start: npm run build:happ && npm run start:agent
scripts.network: npm run build:happ && concurrently-repeat "npm run start:agent"
scripts.test: npm run build:happ && cd test && npm run test
scripts.start:agent: cross-env REACT_APP_HC_PORT=$(port) REACT_APP_CLIENT_PORT=$(port) concurrently "npm run start:happ" "sleep 5 && cd client && yarn start"
scripts.start:happ: rimraf .hc* && RUST_LOG=warn echo "pass" | hc s --piped generate ./dna/workdir/happ/glassbeadgame.happ --run=$REACT_APP_HC_PORT -a glassbeadgame network mdns
scripts.build: npm run build:happ && npm run build:ui
scripts.build:ui: cd client && rimraf build && npm run build
scripts.build:happ: npm run build:dna && hc app pack ./dna/workdir/happ
scripts.build:dna: npm run build:zome && hc dna pack ./dna/workdir/dna
scripts.package: npm run build && npm run package:ui && hc web-app pack ./workdir
scripts.package:ui: cd client && rimraf ui.zip && cd build && bestzip ../ui.zip *
